title: Announcement: Permanent Server Shutdown
body:
We would like to inform all our valued users and artists that the Lyrical Chord application and website have been permanently shut down. Due to ongoing internal challenges, we are no longer able to continue operating or maintaining our services.

We sincerely apologize for the inconvenience this may cause and deeply appreciate the love, creativity, and support you have shared with us throughout this journey.

Although this marks the end of the Lyrical Chord platform, we are grateful for the community that formed around it. Thank you for being a part of our story.
